name: Upset
description:
The dead are upset ... someone stole their tombstones and littered them on the graveyard.  Was it you?  Who knows!

Quick, JOIN them TOGETHER before the upset dead catch you.

How to play

Moving: Arrow keys or WASD
Drop stone to speed up: Space key

Collect each tombstone and return it to it's grave to make the dead return to their grave for their well deserved rest.

Team - Sole Developer

I am a sole developer and have a lot of fun trying to complete a game for my first game jam.

Assets

Audio effects, Graphics and Coding: Currit Games

Font: Adobe Source Sans 3

Background music: Wrapped in dreams - base track 02

Tools used
  • Aseprite - Animated sprite editor & pixel art tool
  • Godot - Game engine
  • Audacity - Sound editing and recording
